charges.charge_description: 21:846 NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Conspiracy To Distribute 50 Grams or More of Cocaine Base, 21:846, 841(b)(1)(A)(iii) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE: Twenty (20) months credit time served from 12/5/90 for a total of thirteen (13) months and deft. shall serve seven (7) months from today; Supervised relief five (5) years under standard condtions and special conditions; deft shall participate in drug after care program fro substance abuse which may include testing for alcohol or other drugs; fifty dollars ($50.00) assessment; do not associate with persons known to be drug dealers or in any way be invloved with drug users or the drug culture. Court recommends incarceration in Loudoun County Virginia; deft. shall not be sent to D.C. Jail. All remaining counts dismissed by Government. SUPERVISED RELEASE REVOKED. DEFENDANT RESENTENCED to Seven (7) Months Incarceration. (1)
